page.title: 09LIVE AID FOR ETHIOPIA,1985
page.content:
On the 13th july,1985 the greatest rock pop concert was held to raise money for the famine victims in Ethiopia.Two concerts took place one in Wembley stadium and one in the J.F.K.stadium in Philedelphia.The greatest rock stars in the world took part.The concerts were organised by Bob Geldof lead singer of the Boomtown Rats,who was compelled to do something when he saw the apalling pictures sent back from Ethiopia.The concerts were watched by billions of people worldwide on television and radio.The concert started at noon at Wembley and finished at 4a.m. the following morning in philedelphia,lasting a total of 16 hours.
{
